name: A pair of flamehardened gloves
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users dexterity pathetically.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It increases the users wisdom adequately.
It increases the users intelligence adequately.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration noticably.
This item loses its magical powers somewhat slower than average.
It increases the users fire resistance adequately.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
